newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market slow - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market slow - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow in the Panhandle area early Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry.

Sales reported on 100 slaughter heifers; 12,800 head confirmed for the week which includes 12,200 formulated cattle. Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs 69.00.
